text:
Letter to Dr. Harry J. Skornia
-2-
April 28, 1958
I would hope NAEB Legal Counsel could keep on top of the matter.
Naturally, we are most anxious to receive any and all information.
If you or Marcus Cohn require additional information, please let
us know.
Sincerely,
Television
and KUON-TV
NAEB Vice President
JM: et
